# Tender Announcement

## 20240419 - Office Furniture for Tribunals

### Overview
Administrative Tribunals Support Service of Canada (ATSSC) invites bids from eligible contractors to provide office furniture to its Ottawa, Ontario location. The tender is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

### Key Information

*   Tender Reference Number: cb-483-89472629
*   Solicitation Number: 20240419
*   Publication Date: 2024-06-17
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-06-27T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-07-15
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2024-08-23

### Requirements
The requirement includes the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa, Ontario by August 23, 2024 or as soon as possible. This procurement is set aside from the international trade agreements under the provision each has for set-asides for small and minority businesses.

### Security Requirements
There is a security requirement associated with the requirement. For additional information, consult the bid solicitation document.

### Contact Info
For any queries or concerns, please contact:
Annie Gélinas-Olive
Email: [annie.gelinas-olive@tribunal.gc.ca](mailto:annie.gelinas-olive@tribunal.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 868-3222

### Attachments
The following documents are available for download:
1.  Floor Plan - Office Furniture for ATSSC (.pdf)
2.  Bid Solicitation Document (.pdf)

[Attachments are available under https: canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/ 40332](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/40332)

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is not subject to any international trade agreements, as per Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity
The tender is open to all regions of Canada.

### Regions of Delivery
The proposed office furniture will be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

### Decision Criteria
The selection criteria for this tender is based on the lowest price.
